parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.76

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Remove a weapon from a unit. An attempt to remove a weapon, which is not in unit's possession, is simply ignored.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''removeWeaponGlobal''' weapon

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]] - weapon class name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{
	_x [[removeWeaponGlobal]] "Laserdesignator";
} [[forEach]] [[allUnits]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>{
	[[if]] ([[typeOf]] _x == "O_Heli_Attack_02_black_F") [[then]] {
		_x [[removeWeaponGlobal]] "rockets_Skyfire";
	};
} [[forEach]] [[vehicles]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addWeaponGlobal]], [[removeWeapon]], [[removeMagazine]], [[removeMagazineGlobal]], [[removeAllWeapons]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
